tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Took my wife to see Dr. Jayaprada, after she complained of chest pains. She listened patiently to everything and suggested few nominal tests. ********* ********* **** ***, which was also proven by the test results. Her pleasant personality helped calm my wife and myself.

She is too good and expertized in gynaec related issues she even helped me alot by identifying my other issues very polite and calm... And the best thing is you will never feel this hospital as hospital. Can consider it as homely

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
She explains politely and profoundly
And the treatment she gave was excellent
I suffered for the last 3 months after her consultation and her medicine now makes me well, thank you doctor
Very friendly.. She used to explain each and everything from the scan report.. Within three months of time i was conceived... Highly recommend...

My experience was not good with this Doctor. Did not let me explain my problems completely  and started doing all the tests. 
She is a senior doctor i agree but she should have patience to listen the patient problems first,  need to know what some one is  actually facing .
Billed 5500/-RS for first visit  including all the test and medicine.... I felt like It was a business going on there.
  i could not effort this costly treatment and continue to next  month  anymore  so visited another Doctor .
DR.Jayaprada(11 years experience)
Obestetrician and Gynaecologist
DR.Jaya is very friendly and listened to  all my problems and gave me counsiling.
DR.Bhavani gave medicines worth of 2400/-Rs.....where as Dr.Jaya gave me medicines worth of 1000/-RS
DR.BHavani charged 2600 for test(Scan, Thiroid, blood.etc)... DR. Jaya is  charging 1200 for the same tests.
 Consultation fee Dr.Bhavani  500/-RS.... Dr.Jaya 250/-( not worried about it as she is more experienced)
Almost i spent  2850/-RS  more. This amount really matters for me.

I don't suggest anyone not  to go to this doctor... if you can effort you can go. I just  Explained the things that i  experienced. Now  Choice is yours.
Very friendly and politeful doctor and also easy to understand patient condition as well as suggest some health tips.

**** ******. She is very patient to hear us and explain on our doubts. Available on her phone at any time you require. Also the hospital provides a clean environment and a medicines are available from the hospital itself.
Very friendly And doctor will listen us first then she will guide and provide the medication .it's better

Excellent !!!
Very kind in responding to all queries.

when a girl will be in pregnancy stage The very first person is her mother who takes good care,  but  Dr jayaprada proved that a doctor can also be the same as a mother.she took good care of all patients.
